EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to the Helix Alpha Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome to Helix Alpha
Thank you for your support as we build an exciting personal genomics platform to help you explore your DNA.
Let's get started https://alpha.helix.com/invite/{!Lead.Invitation_Code__c}/
You’ll be helping us test the process of ordering a kit and saliva sample collection. It should be quick and easy, and we look forward to hearing your thoughts and feedback.
Cheers,
The Helix Team
Helix Alpha FAQs https://alpha.helix.com/faq/
